attributes.action: Introduce a Bank Holiday every October to celebrate Heroes
attributes.additional_details: The clapping every Thursday brought us together as a nation. Everyone in the country were unified in their appreciation of these people who got us through this. It's important that our appreciation is shown forever
attributes.background: Have a UK bank holiday every October where people can celebrate the NHS, Carers and others who got us through this crisis. It should be called "Heroes Day". It should also consider those that fought and supported in wars
